participant_1.background:
I procrastinate on my lesson plans.
I work in a fast-paced environment that encourages me to try new things and learn from my mistakes.
i live on the third floor in an apartment.
My laundry takes a backseat to my many projects.
I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.

participant_2.background:
I'm usually too busy with school work to keep up with my family, but I try my best.
my hobbies are sleeping and playing the guitar.
i am going to school to get my bachelors degree.
I live in a small apartment with my cat Charlie, but I dream of having a house with a big yard so they can run around.
it s great fun.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you doing?
I'm doing good too, thanks! I'm just relaxing on my day off.
Nice! I'm usually too busy with school work to relax, but I'm trying to make more time for it.
That's good, you deserve to relax sometimes! What's your major?
I'm studying to get my Bachelor's degree in Business Administration.
Oh cool, that's a good field to get into! What do you want to do after you graduate?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going into marketing.
That's a great choice! Marketing is a really fun field.
Thanks! I'm excited to learn more about it.
Do you have any hobbies?
Yes, I love to play the guitar and I love to sleep.
Nice! I love to play the guitar too.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is probably blues.
That's cool, I love blues music too.
Nice! Maybe we should jam sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to jam with you.
Cool! We can exchange numbers and we can set something up.
Sounds good!
